bg.auth.authorize.invalid.body_html:
Кодът Ви за авторизация е невалиден.
Моля уверете се да копирате и поставите целия линк от полученият E-mail.
bg.auth.authorize.invalid.heading: Авторизацията е невалидна
bg.auth.authorize.success_growl: Изпращаме Ви към вашето меню с игри.
bg.auth.forgot.email_help: Въведете E-mail адреса си, за да можем да Ви изпратим информацията за влизане.
bg.auth.forgot.heading: Забравен псевдоним/парола.
bg.auth.forgot.invalid_email_error_html: Хмм, този E-mail адрес не е в нашата система. Може би не сте регистрирани?
bg.auth.forgot.sent.body_html: Изпратихме Логин Информацията на Имейла който ваведохте
bg.auth.forgot.sent.heading: Информацията е изпратена.
bg.auth.forgot.sent.spam: Ако не получите нашия Имейл до 10 Минути . Моля проверете Спам . Може да е заврян там . :)
bg.auth.join.almost.body_html:
Преди да влезете в Game Jolt, ще трябва да потвърдите имейла на вашия акаунт.

Ние изпратихме имейл с инструкции за потвърждаване на акаунт.
bg.auth.join.almost.heading: Почти стигна!
bg.auth.join.almost.spam: Ако не видите имейла ни до 10 минути, проверете спам папката. Може да е захвърлено там .
bg.auth.join.almost.urgency: Знай, че имате 1 седмица да си упълномощиш акаунта. Ако не, акаунта ви ще бъде изтрит и ще трябва да направите нов :(
bg.auth.linked_account.twitter.finalize.dup:
Имейла, който въведохте вече се използва..

Ако все още имаш Game Jolt акаунт, влез тук..

Ако си забравил информацията си за влизане, можеш да си я припомниш тук.
bg.auth.linked_account.twitter.finalize.ema: За да завършите влизане чрез Twitter, моля въведете валиден и-мейл адрес.
bg.auth.reset_password.heading: Смени парола
bg.auth.reset_password.password_help: Ако искате да смените паролата си , напишете нова в кутията .
bg.auth.join.page_title: Присъедини се към Гейм Джолт ! - Център за Инди Игри от Хора :3
bg.auth.linked_account.facebook.duplicate_e:
Фейсбук Имейла когото използвате вече се Използва !
Може би вече имате АКаунт?
bg.auth.linked_account.facebook.failed_grow: Не стана да се Логнете със Фейсбук . Сорка
bg.auth.linked_account.facebook.no_email_gr: Не можахме да се свържем сас Вашият Фейсбук . Моля Оверете се че сте потвърдили Акаунта ви със Фейсбук
bg.auth.linked_account.twitter.failed_growl: Не Можахме да ви Логнем със Туитър
bg.auth.reset_password.success_growl: Паролата ви бе променена успешно. Сега можете да влезете във своят акаунт със новата.
bg.chat.no_friends_message_html: Прави приятели на сайта за да си пишете,виж какво играят, и играй с тях!
bg.dash.avatar.body_html:
Ние понастоящем използваме Gravatar (Глобално Разпознати Аватари) за аватарите във GameJolt.
Ако още нямате Gravatar акаунт, можете да натиснете бутона по-доло за да отворите gravatar.com и да се регистрирате. Имайте на предвид, че ще трябва да се впишете със Wordpress акаунта си. Моля? Нямате и Wordpress акаунт? Без тревога! Ще можете да направите и двата акаунта по едно и също време!
Имате Gravatar акаунт? Супер! Впишете се и качете аватар по ваш избор, тогава свържете този аватар с E-Mail-а, който използвате за вход във GameJolt.
Вашият аватар ще се промени глобално за уебсайта.
Имайте на предвид, че може да отнеме малко време преди новият аватар да се появи тук. Ако не го виждате след време, което за вас се струва много, можете да пробвате да прочистите Кеша на Вашият интернет браузър.
bg.dash.avatar.heading: Как се взима аватар?
bg.dash.change_pass.heading: Промяна на парола за акаунт
bg.dash.change_pass.invalid_old_password_er: Паролата която бе въведена е грешна
bg.dash.change_pass.no_match_error: Паролите не съвпадат! Пробвайте да ги въведете отново и бъдете сигурни че са еднакви.
bg.dash.email_prefs.heading: Ваши предпочитания за Поща
bg.dash.email_prefs.notifications_descripti: Позволете ни да знаем какви Писма да ви пращаме, като нагласите предпочитанията си по-доло.
bg.dash.forms.image_filetype_help_html:
Изображението трябва да бъде от формат PNG, JPG или GIF.
PNG-тата се препоръчват тъй като създават изображение което не се губи.
bg.dash.forms.thumbnail_filetype_help_html:
Изображението трябва да бъде от формат PNG, JPG или GIF.
Анимирани GIFs са перфектни за показване на част от играта ви в действие.
PNG-тата се препоръчват тъй като създават изображение което не се губи.
bg.dash.funds.withdraw.email_help: Трябва да е валиден E-Mail адрес прикачен към PayPal акаунт.
bg.dash.funds.withdraw.form_help_html: Моля, убедете се че информацията, която е въведена долу е правилна. Няма да имате възможността да я промените след като я публикувате.
bg.dash.funds.withdraw.heading: Withdraw Revenue
bg.dash.funds.withdraw.page_help_html:
Please allow 3 days for withdrawals to be processed. At this time all withdrawals are processed through PayPal.

If you don't have a PayPal account, you will not be able to withdraw any money. Please be sure to sign up with a PayPal account before trying to withdraw funds.
bg.dash.games.add.fnaf_autotag_message_html: It appears that your game may be a Five Nights at Freddy's fan game, spinoff, or unofficial sequel. Therefore, we have added the hashtag #fnaf to your game's description. We require this tag for all games derived from the Five Nights at Freddy's series.
bg.dash.games.add.heading: Добави игра
bg.dash.games.api.overview.data_items_toolt: The total number of stored global data items.
bg.dash.games.api.overview.heading: Game API Overview
bg.dash.games.api.overview.page_help_html:
The Game API lets you spice up your game with scoreboards, trophies, cloud data storage, session logging, and more.

You can check the links below to see if the community has already written an API library or plugin for the engine/tool/language you use. Of course, you can always write one yourself and share it in the forums!
bg.dash.games.api.overview.page_help_link: Learn more about the Game API...
bg.dash.games.api.overview.scores_tooltip: The total number of scores across all of the game's scoreboards, including guest scores.
bg.dash.games.api.overview.scores_users_too: The number of users with scores on any of the game's scoreboards. Does not include guests.
bg.dash.games.api.overview.sessions_help: Sessions show you who's playing your game and for how long.
bg.dash.games.api.overview.trophies_exp_too: The total awardable EXP for trophies in your game.
bg.dash.games.api.settings.heading: Настройки на Game API
bg.dash.games.api.settings.page_alert_html: Never give your private key to anyone! Your game's key is used to validate that API requests are coming from your game. If villains or knaves get ahold of it, they can send in fake requests pretending to be your game. Not good!
bg.dash.games.builds.form.dimensions_help_h: These are the dimensions at which your browser build will be displayed.
bg.dash.games.builds.form.disable_right_cli: This allows you to disable right mouse click behavior. Only enable this if your game needs to intercept right clicks.
bg.dash.games.builds.form.no_platforms_erro: You have to select at least one platform on which your build runs (or "Other").
bg.dash.games.builds.form.platforms_help_ht: Select "Other" if this build is for a platform that's not shown, or if it's a non-executable file such as a PDF.
bg.dash.games.data_store.items.heading: Data Storage Items
bg.dash.games.data_store.items.page_help_ht:
You can use the API to store data... in the cloud! All stored data items will show up here.

Currently, you can only view (and remove) globally stored data items. Stored user data items are not viewable at this time.
bg.dash.games.data_store.items.page_help_li: Научи повече относно хранилището за данни
bg.dash.games.data_store.items.view.heading: Детайли на предмета
bg.dash.games.form.engine_other_why_tooltip: This helps us create better filtering options around which tools people use.
bg.dash.games.header.page_help_html: Headers are the big, banner-like images that adorn the tops of game pages. For your header to look its best on mobile devices in portrait mode, make sure anything important is located near the center of the image.
bg.dash.games.header.page_help_link: What are the header requirements and guidelines?
bg.dash.games.hidden_message: This game is currently hidden from public view.
bg.dash.games.hidden_message_unpublished: We recommend keeping it hidden until you've finished filling out the details and added some media. Don't forget to unhide it when it's ready, or it won't show up in the game listings!
bg.dash.games.maturity.page_help_html: Every game on Game Jolt, even works-in-progress, needs a maturity rating to describe its content. Accurate ratings and details about content help gamers make informed decisions. Remember, you can always come back later and make changes.
bg.dash.games.maturity.wip_help: If you don't know what the final content of your game will be, give an educated guess. You can make changes later.
bg.dash.games.media.add.image.page_help_htm: Add screenshots, concept drawings, photos of little clay models, fake box covers, or any other original art created for the game. Yes, even if it's a text-based game!
bg.dash.games.media.add.video.page_help_htm:
Add videos you've created, such as trailers, gameplay footage, walkthroughs, etc.

Please don't add Let's Plays or reviews. Let the content owners do that themselves in the comments.
bg.dash.games.media.image.form.caption_help: This caption will appear when your image is viewed in full screen.
bg.dash.games.media.page_help_html: Want people to play your game? Add some images and video to your page. We recommend adding as many images and videos as you can--even if your game is all text!
bg.dash.games.media.video.form.url_help_htm:
We currently only support videos from Vimeo or YouTube.
The URL should look something like:
YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oHg5SJYRHA0
Vimeo: http://www.vimeo.com/2619976
bg.dash.games.music.no_music_html: You haven't added any music. Upload some songs from your game! The music player's worth it, trust us!
bg.dash.games.music.page_help_html: Let people enjoy your game's soundtrack whenever they want! Upload MP3s of music from your game and the songs will appear on your game page in a nice little music player. Don't upload copyrighted songs without permission!
bg.dash.games.overview.publish_confirmation: Publishing your game makes it visible on the site, so make sure your game page is lookin' good!
bg.dash.games.overview.todo_info_builds_pro: You still have builds that are being processed. They won't show on your game page until they're finished processing.
bg.dash.games.packages.form.description_hel: This should be filled in only if it's needed, if the name alone isn't enough to distinguish this package from other packages.
bg.dash.games.packages.form.title_help_html: This is the name that shows up on your game page above the Download/Play button. For your main package, use the title of your game.
bg.dash.games.packages.manage.releases.head: Releases
bg.dash.games.packages.manage.releases.hidd: This release is hidden and won't show up on your game page until published.
bg.dash.games.packages.manage.releases.page: Releases represent new versions of your package. If you update a package, you should add a release. You can group all of the new builds for different platforms into a single new release.
bg.dash.games.packages.manage.releases.publ: This release is published and can be accessed from your game page.
bg.dash.games.packages.page_help_html:
Packages are how you organize and distribute your game's builds and other files.

Your primary package should contain the builds you want people to play. You can create new packages to contain additional files, such as level editors, art packs, expansions, and other DLC.
bg.dash.games.releases.builds.launch_option: Oh no! We didn't find any executable files for this platform in the archive.

We've detected that this build is a standalone executable file.

It can be launched automatically.
bg.dash.games.releases.builds.processing_me: Processing build. It will become available in this release as soon as we're done.
bg.dash.games.releases.form.version_number_:
Version numbers are how you label releases.
Numbering should follow the format MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH.
Learn more about choosing a good version number...
bg.dash.games.scoreboard.form.asc_help: Scores with lower values are ranked better.
bg.dash.games.scoreboard.form.desc_help: Scores with higher values are ranked better.
bg.dash.games.scoreboard.form.unique_help: Only show a user's best score?
bg.dash.games.scoreboards.heading: Scoreboards
bg.dash.games.scoreboards.page_help_html:
The API allows you to add multiple customized scoreboards, with control over sorting options and guest scoring, and the ability to attach extra hidden data to scores.

The primary scoreboard is the one that will show by default on your game's page. Set a new primary by dragging a scoreboard into the first slot.
bg.dash.games.scores.list.heading: View Scores
bg.dash.games.scores.list.page_help_html: These are all of the scores that have been submitted to this scoreboard by users and guests (if allowed).
bg.dash.games.scores.user.list.heading: View Scores
bg.dash.games.scores.user.list.no_scores_ht: The user has no scores on this scoreboard.
bg.dash.games.scores.view.data_none_help: No extra data for this score. You can use the extra data field to store information to help you weed out cheaters and validate scores. It's never shown to users.
bg.dash.games.scores.view.heading: Score Details
bg.dash.games.settings.ads_help_html:
Turning this off will remove all ads for this game.

Only do this if you don't want to monetize your game, or if your game is subject to a license that doesn't allow monetization.
bg.dash.games.settings.comments_help_html:
Turning this off will disable comments for this game and hide any comments already on the page.

The community will no longer be able to give you feedback via comments, but you may prefer this if your game contains sensitive or controversial material.

This will never remove comments from your game page—merely hide them. If you allow comments again in the future, all previously hidden comments will be restored.
bg.dash.games.settings.ga_tracking_id_help_:
Use Google Analytics to track a multitude of stats and get tons of information about your game page. Just enter your Google Analytics tracking ID here and we'll start sending data over there right away.

Here's how to set get started:

  • Create (or log into an existing) Google Analytics account.
  • Set up a new Property (go to the Admin tab and select Create new property from the dropdown menu under Property).
  • Select Website and enter gamejolt.com as the URL.
  • Select an Industry Category and a Reporting Time Zone.
  • Click Get Tracking ID.
  • Come back here and enter your Tracking ID.
  • You're all set!
bg.dash.games.settings.ratings_help_html:
Turning this off will disable ratings for this game and hide any ratings already on the page.

Your game's voltage will be calculated as if it had received no ratings. If you allow ratings in the future, the old ratings will be reapplied and your voltage will be recalculated.
bg.dash.games.thumbnail.page_help_html:
A thumbnail is the little rectangular image that represents your game throughout the site. People can click it in game listings and search results to get to your game page.

Please don't choose an image that contains nudity, swear words, or adult-oriented imagery.
bg.dash.games.thumbnail.page_help_link: What are the thumbnail requirements and guidelines?
bg.dash.games.trophies.form.hidden_help: Hidden trophies are invisible to everyone but the game's developer, for testing and other nefarious reasons.
bg.dash.games.trophies.form.secret_help: Secret trophies hide everything but their titles from players until they are achieved.
bg.dash.games.trophies.has_hidden_html: You have hidden trophies! Be sure to unhide them when you're ready for players to achieve them.
bg.dash.games.trophies.heading: Game Trophies
bg.dash.games.trophies.page_help_html: The API lets you add multiple unique trophies, each forged from a material that indicates how difficult it is to achieve: bronze (easiest), silver, gold, or platinum (hardest).
bg.dash.integrate.exp_help_body_html:
To earn experience and level up, be sure to rate and comment on the games you play.

However, the fastest way to gather EXP is to achieve trophies and get onto scoreboards!
bg.dash.integrate.heading: Integrate
bg.dash.integrate.lead: Here's a to-do list of things to get you started with the site:
bg.dash.overview.heading: Your Dashboard
bg.dash.overview.revenue_tooltip: Game Jolt gives you a percentage of the ad revenue we make from your games on the site.
bg.dash.profile.edit.display_name_help: If you enter a display name, it'll show up on the site instead of your username. Unlike usernames, display names can contain spaces and special characters.
bg.dash.profile.edit.display_name_time_left:
You can only change your display name once a week.
You have {{ duration }} left until you can change your display name again.
bg.dash.profile.edit.heading: Edit Your Information
bg.dash.profile.edit.username_time_left_htm:
You can only change your username once a week.
You have {{ duration }} left until you can change it again.
bg.discover.home.best_help: A sampling of the highest rated games of all time.
bg.discover.home.fireside_help: Indie game news, reviews, and opinions by people.
bg.discover.home.hot_help: Popular indie games, sorted by Hotness.
bg.game.download.game.downloading_wait_mess: Your download should begin in just a moment...
bg.game.download.game.rate_html: What did you think? Game ratings allow us to show you better stuff. Help curate the site!
bg.game.download.soundtrack.downloading_wai: Your download should begin in just a moment...
bg.game.rating_growl.message: Game ratings allow us to show you better stuff. Help curate the site!
bg.game.rating_growl.title: Rate
bg.game.scores.no_scores_html: There are no scores on this scoreboard yet.
bg.game.scores.no_user_scores_html: You don't have any scores here yet!
bg.game.trophies.heading: Trophies
bg.game.trophies.no_trophies_html: There are no trophies for this game yet. Bug the developer about adding some!
bg.games.list.date_descriptive_html: Games that were published on {{ date }}, sorted by Voltage, with the best scores at the top.
bg.games.list.date_range_descriptive_html: Games that were published between {{ dateStart }} and {{ dateEnd }}, sorted by Voltage, with the best scores at the top.
bg.games.list.featured_descriptive_html: Indie {{ category }} that we've featured on the homepage, sorted by feature date.
bg.games.list.freshness_tooltip: Freshness indicates community interest in recent games. A game's freshness score starts high and decays over time. Community activity can slow the decay.
bg.games.list.hotness_tooltip: Hotness indicates community interest in recent games. A game's Hotness score starts high and decays over time. Community activity can slow the decay.
bg.games.list.new_descriptive_html: Indie {{ category }} sorted by publication date.
bg.games.list.new_games_warning_html: Newly added games are not moderated, curated, or vetted by the community. You can find a goldmine of undiscovered talent or you may see some of the scariest shit of your life.
bg.games.list.voltage_tooltip: Voltage is our weighted rating system. All games start with an average score and the community drags it up or down.
bg.library.collection.developer_descriptive: These are the games made by {{ user }}.
bg.library.collection.developer_owner_descr:
These are the games that you've made. Be proud!
Feel free to share this page with others to show off your games.
bg.library.collection.followed_descriptive_: These are the games that {{ user }} is following.
bg.library.collection.followed_owner_descri:
When you follow a game, it shows up here.
You'll receive notifications when developers post news about any games you're following.
bg.library.collection.no_games_bundle_html: There are no games in this bundle yet.
bg.library.collection.no_games_developer_ht: This developer hasn't added any games yet.
bg.library.collection.no_games_followed_htm: No games are being followed yet.
bg.library.collection.no_games_playlist_htm: There are no games in this playlist yet, alas.
bg.library.collection.no_games_tag_html: There are no games with this tag yet.
bg.library.description_html: This is your personalized library of games. Here dwell the games you've followed and any playlists or bundles that you've made or followed.
bg.library.heading: Game Library
bg.library.nav.no_playlists_html:
Create playlists to organize and share the games in your library.

Follow other people's playlists to discover more games!
bg.library.playlists.developer_description: Here are the games created by this developer.
bg.library.playlists.followed_description: Here are the games this person is following.
bg.notifications.rating_details_html: And the value of the rating thou shalt receive is {{ rating }}. No more, no less.
bg.profile.no_bio_html: This person doesn't have a bio yet, so use your imagination!
bg.profile.no_developer_games_html: This developer hasn't published any games yet. Tell them to get a move on!
bg.scores.overview.heading: Scoreboards
bg.scores.overview.no_scores_html: There are no scores on this scoreboard yet.
bg.scores.scoreboard_popover.heading: Change Scoreboard
bg.search.results.no_results: No results for that search query.
bg.trophies.completion.lead_html: You've achieved {{ achieved | number }} trophies out of a possible {{ total | number }}.
bg.trophies.completion.none_achieved_html: You haven't achieved any trophies for this game yet!
bg.trophies.exp_gained_tooltip: The amount of EXP gained from this trophy.
bg.trophies.invisible_trophies_message: Some trophies may be invisible to players. You're seeing them because you're the developer.
bg.trophies.overview.heading: Trophies
bg.dash.games.api.settings.generate_confirm: Are you sure you want to generate a new key? If you do, any builds of your game using the current key will stop working.
bg.dash.games.api.settings.generate_growl: Generated a brand new private key for your game. You'll need to update your game's code with the new key.
bg.dash.games.data_store.items.remove_confi: Are you sure you want to remove this item?
bg.dash.games.maturity.alcohol_1_descriptio: References to or images of alcoholic beverages.
bg.dash.games.maturity.bloodshed_3_descript: Depictions of bloodshed and the mutilation of body parts.
bg.dash.games.maturity.cartoon_violence_1_d: Depictions of cartoon-like characters in unsafe situations.
bg.dash.games.maturity.cartoon_violence_2_d: Depictions of cartoon-like characters in aggressive conflict.
bg.dash.games.maturity.cartoon_violence_3_d: Graphic depictions of violence involving cartoon-like characters.
bg.dash.games.maturity.drugs_1_description: References to or images of illicit drugs.
bg.dash.games.maturity.fantasy_violence_1_d: Depictions of characters in unsafe situations easily distinguishable from real life.
bg.dash.games.maturity.fantasy_violence_2_d: Depictions of characters in aggressive conflict easily distinguishable from real life.
bg.dash.games.maturity.fantasy_violence_3_d: Graphic depictions of violence involving situations easily distinguishable from real life.
bg.dash.games.maturity.gambling_2_descripti: Players can gamble using real money.
bg.dash.games.maturity.humor_1_description: Depictions of or dialog including slapstick humor.
bg.dash.games.maturity.humor_2_description: Depictions of or dialog including vulgar humor; bathroom humor.
bg.dash.games.maturity.humor_3_description: Depictions of or dialog including mature humor; sexual humor.
bg.dash.games.maturity.language_1_descripti: Mild or infrequent use of profanity.
bg.dash.games.maturity.language_3_descripti: Strong or frequent use of profanity.
bg.dash.games.maturity.nudity_1_description: Brief depictions of nudity or artistic nudity.
bg.dash.games.maturity.realistic_violence_1: Mild depictions of realistic characters in unsafe situations.
bg.dash.games.maturity.realistic_violence_2: Depictions of realistic characters in aggressive conflict.
bg.dash.games.maturity.realistic_violence_3: Graphic depictions of violence involving realistic characters.
bg.dash.games.maturity.sexual_themes_1_desc: Provocative references or depictions of provocative behavior.
bg.dash.games.maturity.sexual_themes_2_desc: Sexual references or depictions of sexual behavior.
bg.dash.games.maturity.sexual_violence_desc: Depictions of or graphic references to rape or other violent sexual behavior.
bg.dash.games.maturity.tobacco_1_descriptio: References to or images of tobacco products.
bg.dash.games.media.remove_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this {{ type }}?
bg.dash.games.music.remove_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this song?

bg.dash.games.scores.view.remove_confirmati: Are you sure you want to remove this score?
bg.dash.games.trophies.form.clear_image_con: Are you sure you want to clear this trophy image?
bg.dash.games.trophies.remove_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this trophy?

bg.dash.email_prefs.notify_comment_replies_: Get emails about replies in comment threads you're watching or to which you've replied.

bg.dash.email_prefs.notify_forum_posts_help: Get emails about forum posts in topics you're watching or which you created.
bg.dash.email_prefs.notify_friendships_help: Get emails about incoming and accepted friend requests.
bg.dash.email_prefs.notify_game_follows_hel: Get emails when people follow your games and find out who they are.
bg.dash.email_prefs.notify_private_messages: Get emails when friends private message you and you're offline.
bg.dash.email_prefs.notify_ratings_help: Get emails when your games have been rated--and find out what ratings they were given.

The release has been unpublished and is now hidden.

bg.dash.games.scoreboards.primary_tooltip: The primary scoreboard is displayed on your game page by default. If your game's API library doesn't support multiple scoreboards, all scores will be submitted to the primary scoreboard.
bg.dash.games.scoreboards.unique_tooltip: Only displays a user's best score.

bg.settings.heading: Настройки
bg.settings.limit_extractions_help: An extraction is when the game is unpacked and installed after downloading.
bg.settings.max_download_count_help: If you have more than this number, downloads will be queued up.
bg.settings.max_extract_count_help: If you have more than this number, extractions will be queued up.
bg.settings.queue_when_playing_help: Should we pause all game installs and updates when you're playing a game?
bg.Automatic translations use Google Transl: Automatic translations use Google Translate and may not be completely accurate.
bg.Get notifications when people post new r: Get notifications when people post new replies to this thread.
bg.Let us know your thoughts and be the fir: Let us know your thoughts and be the first to comment!
bg.system_report.form.description_help: Describe what this system report is about, any bugs you may have encountered, and how you can reproduce.
bg.system_report.send.heading: Send System Report
bg.system_report.send.help: This will send a system report to us with details about your device and client log. We don't collect personal information through this.
bg.system_report.send.issue_tracker: If you experienced a bug, please report it first on our issue tracker.
bg.system_report.sent_growl: Your system report has been sent.
bg.library.installed.change_location_messag: You can change the location where games are installed at any time in your Settings.
bg.library.installed.heading: Installed Games
bg.library.installed.no_games_message: Your installed games show up here... that is, once you have some!
bg.External link to play the game (not uplo: Допълнителен линк за играене на играта (не се качва в сайта)
bg.Game does not belong to this developer: Играта не принадлежи на този разработчик.
bg.Incorrect maturity rating for the conten: Incorrect maturity rating for the content in the game
bg.It contains spoilers and doesn't use spo: It contains spoilers and doesn't use spoiler tags (>!)
bg.It is hate speech or contains graphic co: It is hate speech or contains graphic content
bg.It is pornographic or contains sexually: It is pornographic or contains sexually explicit material
bg.It is spam or unwanted commercial conten: It is spam or unwanted commercial content
bg.No information on game page (no screensh: No information on game page (no screenshots, sparse description, placeholder page, etc.)
bg.Profile or username contains explicit or: Profile or username contains explicit or sensitive material
bg.Thanks for helping us make Game Jolt a p: Благодарим ви, че помагате да направим Game Jolt място за всеки. Ще погледнем възможно най-скоро.
bg.dash.email_prefs.newsletter_help: Would you like to receive an email newsletter that contains updates and announcements of things like new site features, official contests, and interesting games?
bg.footer.client_promo.message: Play games faster with the Game Jolt Client!
bg.<strong>Be sure to remove or block ads f: Be sure to remove or block ads from showing in your browser games. We serve our own ads and share the revenue with developers. Domain names to block: gamejolt.com, *.gamejolt.com, gamejolt.net, *.gamejolt.net
bg.<strong>Java Applets have been deprecate: Java Applets have been deprecated. You can no longer edit your Java Applet builds, although gamers will still be able to play them if their browsers support them. You can add .jar files as downloadables and the Game Jolt Client will correctly launch them for users instead.
bg.<strong>Most browsers have stopped suppo: Most browsers have stopped supporting the Unity Web Player. Please consider exporting to WebGL instead.
bg.<strong>Silverlight builds have been dep: Silverlight builds have been deprecated. You can no longer edit your Silverlight builds, although gamers will still be able to play them if their browsers support them.
bg.<strong>The launch options you entered a: The launch options you entered are invalid. Make sure each selected file is in your build and that it works on the appropriate operating system.
bg.<strong>Your game is part of a jam that: Your game is part of a jam that locks builds during voting. You will not be able to add new builds until the voting period ends.
bg.Could not set the platform for some reas: Could not set the platform for some reason.
bg.For HTML builds, upload a .zip archive c: For HTML builds, upload a .zip archive containing all of your build's files and assets. There must be an {{ filename }} file in the root folder.
bg.This build doesn't seem to be a Windows,: This build doesn't seem to be a Windows, Mac or Linux build, so we've marked it as "Other" for you.
bg.This build has more info to fill in befo: This build has more info to fill in before it will be available in this release.
bg.This build is not launchable on certain: This build is not launchable on certain platforms. They've been disabled below.
bg.This package has builds that are still p: This package has builds that are still processing. They will become available in the package as soon as they're finished processing.
bg.You don't have any builds in this releas: You don't have any builds in this release yet. You won't be able to publish until you put some in.
bg.Check your internet connection and try a: Check your Internet connection and try again.
bg.Oh no! We couldn't download this package: Oh no! We couldn't download this package. Perhaps check that you're still online?
bg.Oh no! We couldn't unpack this package a: Oh no! We couldn't unpack this package after downloading it. Maybe try again?
bg.There's been an error, and it's of the d: There's been an error, and it's of the dubious sort.
This game has no playable builds yet.
bg.This game used to have playable builds b: This game used to have playable builds but they have been removed.
bg.This package can not be installed on you: This package can not be installed on your system, but can be quick played in the client.
This package can not be installed on your system.
bg.We are having trouble connecting to Game: We are having trouble connecting to Game Jolt.
You are currently running this package. Some options have been disabled while it's open.
You do not have access to this page.
bg.You found a secret! But upon further ins: You found a secret! But on further inspection, you realize it's just an empty page.
